PrivacyPolicy_1: We at Business World Investment & Studies are committed to protecting the privacy of visitors to our website. This policy aims to clarify how we collect and use personal information we obtain through our website.
Information_Collection1: We collect personal information you provide to us when you sign up for our services or when you contact us via email. This information may include name, email, telephone number, and other relevant information.
Use_of_information1: We use the information we collect to provide the services and support needed for users, improve the user experience, customize content and ads to suit your interests.
Information_Protection1: We take reasonable security measures to protect personal information from loss, misuse or unauthorized change.
Sharing_information_with_third_parties1: We do not sell or lease personal information to third parties, we may share information with third parties in case they are needed to provide the required services or to comply with applicable laws and legislation.
Visitors'_consent1: By using our website, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
Changes_in_Privacy_Policy1: We may update this policy from time to time.
Contact1: If you have any questions or queries about our Privacy Policy, please contact us via [info@bwiscompltd.com] or [+96675316405].
homePage7: Commercial Organizations managed and operated by Business World Company
our_missionDesc: To be recognized as the leading specialized company in Yemen for investment and studies, excelling in project management, and the provision of high-quality administrative consulting services.
our_goalsDesc: Business World Company Ltd. for Investment and Studies is a specialized company that provides high-quality services in the fields of investment, project management, and entrepreneurship. We offer valuable studies and consulting in management, finance, marketing, and information technology solutions to empower investors and stakeholders to achieve optimal results and economic benefits.
our_messageDesc1: To empower and assist investors and business owners in managing and operating their commercial projects using the latest innovative management systems and methodologies.
our_messageDesc2: To provide support and care for entrepreneurs and startup owners through effective studies and consulting, enabling them to compete and sustain themselves in the market.
our_messageDesc3: To enhance the administrative and financial performance of companies and institutions by implementing qualitative and innovative management systems.
our_messageDesc4: To assist private and public organizations in the optimal use of information technology applications.
